name: requestSceneSessionActivation(_:userActivity:options:errorHandler:)
desc: Asks the system to activate an existing scene, or create a new scene and associate it with your app.
declaration:
func requestSceneSessionActivation(_ sceneSession: UISceneSession?, 
                      userActivity: NSUserActivity?, 
                           options: UIScene.ActivationRequestOptions?, 
                      errorHandler: ((Error) -> Void)? = nil)
